titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Columbus Northern Little League team of Columbus, Georgia, for winning the championship game of the Little League World Series.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/12/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates and honors the Columbus Northern Little League team on winning the 60th annual Little League Baseball World Series. Commends Little League Baseball for continuing the tradition of encouraging the development of sportsmanship and confidence in youth by sponsoring world-class baseball.
